Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities  Should be able to filter out the prospects related to ITeS as per the eligibility of company.Should be able to work on GEM portal.Should be able to monitor (online & offline) ITES prospects from Newspaper/Online Portals & Other Media. Should be able to prepare the online/offline bid as per the RFP & tender Documents.Should have to establish the coordination with Admin/account department for timely preparation of EMDs, BG & Tender Fee.Assist the core sales team in the preparation of sales proposals,presentations and RFP & RFI responses  as needed.Desired Candidate Profile  MBA(sales & marketing) fresher Perks and Benefits  Stipend amount 10K to 15K
